# PaymentMethodPADBankAccountType

The type of bank account associated with the PAD payment. This field is an optional field if the `type` field is set to `PAD`. 

## Enum

* `BUSINESSCHECKING` (value: `'BusinessChecking'`)

* `BUSINESSSAVING` (value: `'BusinessSaving'`)

* `CHECKING` (value: `'Checking'`)

* `SAVING` (value: `'Saving'`)
